content: chevron colour-block blanket finished measurements abbreviations 48 x 60 k = knit yarn cascade eco cloud 150 m - 165 yds 70% merino wool yo = yarn over 30% baby alpaca k2tog = knit two stitches together 4 skeins 1810 colour a 4 skeins 1806 colour b ssk = slip slip knit slip two 2 skeins 1801 colour c stitches separately as if to knit then 2 skeins 1809 colour d place the left needle into the fronts of these two stitches and knit them needles together 7mm / us 10 75 knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge md = mitered decrease slip 2 sts decrease as if to k2tog k1 pass the 2 gauge / gauge slipped sts over 16 sts in 4 / 10cm stockinette stitch pattern repeat pattern repeat is 32 stitches espace tricot montreal canada www espacetricot com pattern for personal use only pattern with colour a cast on 193 stitches row 1 rs and all right side row k1 ssk k13 yo k1 yo k14 md k14 yo repeat brackets until 17 sts remain k1 yo k13 k2tog k1 row 2 ws and all wrong side row purl all stitches purl yo s through the back loop repeat row 1 and 2 for the entire blanket working each colour block for 10 approximately 44 row in the following manner colour a colour b colour c colour d colour b colour a cast off loosely sew in ends and block enjoy espace tricot montreal canada www espacetricot com pattern for personal use only
